text: The 2008–09 Scottish First Division was the fourteenth season of the First Division in its current format of ten teams. ==Promotion and relegation from 2007–08== ===SPL & First Division=== Promoted from First Division to Scottish Premier League * Hamilton Academical ===First & Second Divisions=== Relegated from First Division to Second Division * Stirling Albion Promoted from Second Division to First Division * Ross County (champions) * Airdrie United (losing play-off finalists, promoted due to Gretna's relegation to Division Three) ==League table== ==Results== Teams play each other four times in this league. The play-offs were played over two legs, the winning team in each semi-final advanced to the final.
